Title: Ep. 17 - Getting Involved (Scott Hanselman)
Description: You may have heard of Scott Hanselman from his own podcasts and his very popular tech blog. We talk to him about how he creates all this helpful tech content, why it's important to be a social developer, and how we can evaluate our own coding abilities.
